DOC.detailed_description: This study regulatory post-marketing surveillance Japan , local prospective observational study patient receive Regorafenib gastrointestinal stromal tumor progress cancer chemotherapy . A total 135 patient enrol assessed 6 month standard observational period . At 12 month 24 month first administration Regorafenib confirmation efficacy information include treatment duration survival status patient .
